content: Looking for more rustdoc work, are there any cleanups, bugs, features, etc. That would be a preferred place for me to focus work?
if you want, you could look into these ICEs: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues?q=is%3Aopen+label%3AI-ICE+label%3AT-rustdoc
I haven't triaged them yet, it would be good to have an idea how hard they'd be to fix
or if you feel up for an adventure, https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/63351 - it's definitely a hard issue, but I think the instructions I left are mostly accurate
... I realize I'm mostly picking issue I think I would find fun to work on :laughing: let me look for some beginner issues
maybe https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/79139, that seems self-contained and simple enough
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76998 would also be a lot easier now that most of the refactors are done

Awesome, thanks. And I mean, I don't mind diving into the deep end a bit, it's a fun way to learn. On the other hand, it will definitely take a lot more time than more simple tasks. So I'll take a look at the simpler ones, but may try my hand at the others if I'm looking for something to expand my knowledge :P
https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/76998#issuecomment-735473846 is probably a good place to start then :+1:
